nodes.text: Star Wars: Heroes & Villains Little Golden Book Collection

Star Wars: Heroes & Villains Little Golden Book Collection is a hardcover collection of seven previously published titles in the Star Wars Golden Books series: I Am a Droid, I Am a Hero, I Am a Jedi, I Am a Pilot, I Am a Princess, I Am a Sith, and I Am a Stormtrooper. It was published on August 29, 2017.
